title: New: Kult Country – Slowburn
body:
**Kult Country** have been on the pages of CITR a few times now, and not always met with positivity, I seem to remember being a tad rude about their work in the past.

Their new cut, _Slowburn_, is thankfully a track I can finally meet with a whole load of praise. Their sound finally has a clear personality; it’s dark, elegantly punctuated Manchester aggravation at its finest.

_Slowburn_ is due out on Manchester’s **Sways Records** on April 19. Check out their upcoming dates below.

15th March – Shacklewell Arms, London, UK  
23rd March – The Bunker, Manchester, UK  
31st March – Detestival, Sheffield, UK  
20th April – Soup Kitchen, Manchester, UK  
14th-16th June – Rockorama, Toulon, FR
